definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Ur (Bab. Uru; seat of moon-god worship; hence Eupolemos in Euseb:Praep. Ev. ix. 17 says Kamari/nh| h(/n tinav le/gein po/lin Ou)ri/hn), ancient city in Southern Baby-lonia; OT alw. [[אור כַּשְׂדִּים]] i.e. Ur of the Kasdim (Chaldeans) v. [[כַּשְׂדִּים]] sub [[כשׂד]]; home of Terah, Abram's father, & A.'s point of departure for Mesopotamia & Canaan Ge 11:28, Ge 15:7 (both J), & hence Ne 9:7; also Ge 11:31 (P);—mod. Muqayyar, south of Euphrates, c. 150 miles SE. of Babylon; v. KG:94 f Dl:Pa 226 f COT on Ge 11:28.
